subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Starter Oliver Pérez prevented Manager Willie Randolph from turning to his bullpen earlier than he preferred, and the Mets capitalized on two three-run homers to hang on for a victory.
snippet: Starter Oliver Pérez prevented Manager Willie Randolph from turning to his bullpen earlier than he preferred, and the Mets capitalized on two three-run homers to hang on for a victory.
